bioghist.p: No biographical or historical information is available.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a record book with handwritten and news-clipping recipes. Recipes include salads, main dishes, sides, pickles, breads and rolls, and desserts. Some of the recipes are identified with names and dates, possibly of contributing individuals. Dates range from 1941—1968.
The pages folded and stuck into the recipe book have been removed and placed separately in the folder to preserve the loose pages.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by type of material.
